summary: NARY 05/28/2003  *MR  THE VEHICLE STALLED OUT ON FOUR DIFFERENT OCCASIONS, FUEL PUMP WAS REPLACED, AND THE POWER TRAIN CONTROL MODULE WAS  FIXED.   THE CONSUMER FEELS THAT THE VEHICLE IS A SERIOUS SAFETY  DEFECT AND NONCOMFORMITY THAT LEAVES THEM AN AS WELL AS OTHER MOTORIST AT RISK OF A SERIOUS ACCIDENT.  *CB
